alert.note: Alert for Loess Plains (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 29 at 2:38AM CST until January 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NEBRASKA FIRE WEATHER ZONE 219 IN SOUTHWEST NEBRASKA... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * Affected Area...In NEZ219...Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * Winds...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Weather conditions will be favorable for rapid fire growth and erratic fire behavior. Fires may be difficult to control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
